definition: the seven apertures of the human head: 2 eyes, 2 ears, 2 nostrils, 1 mouth
Seventeen-Arch Bridge in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing

sentences.english: This stone bridge with 17 arches, called the seventeen hole bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这座石桥有17个桥洞，叫十七孔桥。

sentences.english: Like a rainbow, the Seventeen-arch Bridge is captivating, lying on the lake in the mists.
sentences.chinese: 浩淼烟波中，十七孔桥似长虹偃月横卧水面。

sentences.english: However, on the seventh day, Hun Dun bled from the seven orifices to death.
sentences.chinese: 可是，凿到第七天，浑沌却被凿得七孔流血而死了。

sentences.english: Silver earrings were used to prevent evil spirits from entering the body through any orifices.
sentences.chinese: 银质耳环常用来驱赶通过七孔进入身体的邪灵。

sentences.english: Return on the east side of Kuming lake so that you eventually reach the '17 Arch Bridge'.
sentences.chinese: 从东面的昆明湖回来后，最后会到十七孔桥。

definition: the seven apertures of the human head: 2 eyes, 2 ears, 2 nostrils, 1 mouth
water caltrop or water chestnut (genus Trapa)
flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]
